synopsis.text: Cake connoisseur Ichigo Amano returns to Japan after a two-year culinary adventure in Paris, eager to continue her journey towards becoming a world-class pâtissière. Upon enrolling in St. Marie Academy, she is disheartened to learn that her former team, Team Ichigo, has disbanded, with each of the Sweets Princes pursuing their own culinary dreams. However, Henri Lucas has a new project in store for Ichigo, bringing her together with Makoto Kashino and new team members Lemon Yamagishi and Johnny McBeal. As they work together to establish their own sweets shop, Ichigo and Makoto's bond deepens, but complications arise as Johnny and Miya Koshiro vie for their affections. With her dream of opening a pâtisserie within reach, Ichigo discovers that it takes more than just scrumptious sweets to succeed in the world of pastry.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
